name: Giant Crush
description:
Meet new crush-ing game!

Fight colorful and crazy giants with the funniest weapons: fish, paintball gun, rockets, banana launcher, and more!

DEFEAT THEM IF YOU CAN!

Giant Crush helps you deal with stress and anger.

Want to beat your ex? Smash the giant’s head with Thunder Hammer!
Want to hit the boss? Take Flamethrower and set the giant on fire!
Having a bad day? Grab Duck and BEAT GIANTS UP!

Just play Giant Crush and have fun!

== GAME FEATURES ==
- Lots of exciting content!
- Hilarious characters and face reactions!
- Choose any weapon you want!
